committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release on behalf of the United States certain restrictions contained in a previous conveyance of land to the city of Albuquerque, N. Mex., and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release by quitclaim deed or other instrument all conditions in a patent on previously transferred land to the City of Albuquerque, New Mexico, which require that such land be used for public purposes and prohibit transfer of its title or control. Conditions such release on an agreement by the City to exchange such land for other land originally conveyed by patent to named individuals. Requires the City to use the land it receives in exchange exclusively for a community park or other public purposes. Declares that the City will forfeit title to and possession of such land to the United States if it attempts to transfer title or control of the land.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release on behalf of the United States certain restrictions contained in a previous conveyance of land to the city of Albuquerque, N. Mex., and for other purposes.
